All authorial proceeds of this book will go to charitable, nonprofit organizations in the State of Vermont-- mostly relating to the needs of children, Graf wrote in an e-mail when asked about where money from book sales would go. A source close to the singer said: Cheryl Cole 's signed the deal, the Americans like her, but suddenly there's all this typical Simon Cowell smoke and mirrors going on. "She's been straight with Simon Cowell but suddenly people aren't returning her calls. She doesn't want to get into a put-up scrap with Nicole Scherzinger with Simon Cowell playing the puppet master. Simon Cowell , 51, is betting everything on the success of the US show and has dismayed ITV chiefs by refusing point blank to do the next British X Factor. But US TV bosses are

to take his British programme The X Factor to America this year, and speculation is rife over who will judge it. Jane Lynch insists the rumours can now end, as she has the perfect solution. People have asked me, "What about having Sue on The X Factor? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears, she laughed. "It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there"s only room for one ego on the show!
